amendment.description: An amendment numbered 16 printed in Part A of House Report 115-711 to prioritize the operation, maintenance, and improvement of existing infrastructure.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Meadows amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A016) offered by Mr. Meadows.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Meadows amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
